assets.changelog:
> Bug 集合体了这是

## 新功能

- feat: 档案选择页面滚动条 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/816
- feat: 将“下载正版玩家皮肤”移到 百宝箱 中 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/846
- feat: 更改瞅眼服务器的背景 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/836

## 修复

- fix: 不会自动处理 Curseforge 的重定向链接 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d82655d7f8cf1d32b87ec9fda424bda75da511dd
- fix: 长于当前收藏夹的选项名显示不完整 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/815
- fix: 深色模式对话框阴影颜色有误 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/822
- fix: 启动参数位置有误导致预览版启动失败 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/a3879ba6cdaf3ce61a3d8e19b261a23aeabb807d
- fix: Java 选择的一堆破问题 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/45b3d21806f79ba84d26bae661c32fb37d4a2a52
- fix: 加载头像时可能发生错误 by @shimoranla in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/9fbe542ec0c0b2146feecd389fc1f6439579c67e
- fix: 部分链接不正确 by @wyc-26 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d039e20e9ec8ddc371333d9002411af058f2e458

## 小修改

- chore: 降低日志等级 by @shimoranla in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/825
- feat: 增加 BsDiff 为之后的增量更新做准备 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/6ae338413181a725a7be5421cfb30645230f295a


**完整更新日志**: https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/compare/2.11.5...2.11.6

---

[如果你有 Mirror 酱 CDK 可以直接使用此高速下载源](https://mirrorchyan.com/zh/projects?rid=PCL2-CE&source=pcl2ce-gh-release)
你也可以直接在下方的 Assets 中下载
